title: Within a mile o' Edinburgh Town
author: Hardy, Robina F.
snippet: " While Jean was thus counselled and warned, comforted andreproved, Lizzie Fairlie was wandering away among the woods or alongthe high-road, with no sign of success as yet. At the turn of LibertonRoad she met a familiar form. A woman, carrying a market basket andapparently a good deal tired with her walk, stopped right in front of her.
